title: Can a person eat, sleep or go out of home in state of janabah (major sexual impurity)? Assimalhakeem
transcript: can a person go out of his home after having intercourse without taking rusul some people say that we should not go out without russell because jin may attack please clarify no this is totally wrong this has no basis to it a person can leave home without having his hustle can leave home in the state of janaba can eat in the state of janaba can go to bed in the state of janab it is recommended that he breaks this state by performing wudhu that's it but if he doesn't yes he can go and do shopping do whatever he wants and come back is it the best scenario no but there is no prohibition in it
